channel.title: How do I edit this?
channel.description:
How do I edit the parts circled in red in the following picture?
http://i39.tinypic.com/673vqr.jpg
I know how to edit the server name, the message at the top, the message of the week, and the member credit area, but how do I edit the bank pin thing and the "Jagex will never contact you" thing? Thanks!!

item.title: How do I edit this?
item.dc:creator: @smerf45 smerf45
item.description:
@smerf45 wrote:

sprites can you help me look at my “MONEY NOTATON” help thread please !

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit this?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

Am I seriously the only one without air in their heads here…

Guys, this isn’t a 317, you don’t go to “TextHandler.java” and you don’t have a “Sprites” folder, it is a 500+ server, he needs to find the id number for the line of code he has there and he can change it that one. Search around on google for one.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit this?
item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

It’s edidted in the picture, go into your sprites find the image of the interface, and edidit it, or re make it with a interface maker.(My thread in client ahcking) and re do all that.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I edit this?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

smerf45:

go into your source file and look for “texthandler.java” and simply search for the text you are trying to change

Doesn’t work like that. Not all the text is in there, I know for 317’s you have to do something like this: sendQuest("Welcome to Spades-Scape", 15038);
You have to get that line of code, which that for instance is 15038, each line has something different.

Read full topic
